text:
Hello,
I had an installation of tomcat 4.0.1 running on my machine some days before 
2002.
From January, 1st 2002 and after, tomcat ran well but "forgot" to save AccessLog to 
file (the one called like localhost_access_log.2001-12-30.txt).
Last file I had on my machine was just that one. I had to restart it bu hand have 
tomcat generate access file again.

Can someone check if this problem was only mine?

Thanks,
Alex
creator: polverini@explo-it.com

text:
There was a bug in the rotation check for the log files. 4.0.2 b1 has the fix,
and of course 4.0.2 when it's released will also have it.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4327 ***
creator: remm@apache.org
